Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.utilities

Class Boxes

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.utilities.Boxes
public class Boxes extends Object
Static class for getting all the required boxes for the game.

  • Method Details

    • board

      static javafx.scene.layout.HBox board(GameModel gameModel, String player, BoardContainer boardContainer)
      General box for containing the board and the assistant.
      Parameters:
      gameModel - GameModel for getting all the required information.
      player - The name of the player who owns the board.
      boardContainer - The BoardContainer for storing all required information.
      Returns:
      The generated HBox.

    • islandStudent

      static javafx.scene.layout.HBox islandStudent(HouseColor houseColor, int students, IslandContainer islandContainer)
      General box for containing a student on an island.
      Parameters:
      houseColor - The color of the student to put.
      students - The number of students of that color.
      islandContainer - The IslandContainer for storing all required information.
      Returns:
      The generated HBox.

    • boardRightBox

      private static javafx.scene.layout.VBox boardRightBox(Player player, BoardContainer boardContainer)
      General box for containing the assistant and, eventually, the number of owned coins.
      Parameters:
      player - The required player.
      boardContainer - The BoardContainer for storing all required information.
      Returns:
      The generated VBox.

    • getAssistant

      private static javafx.scene.image.ImageView getAssistant(Player player, BoardContainer boardContainer)
      Gets the played assistant or wizard according to the situation.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who owns the played assistant.
      boardContainer - The BoardContainer for storing all required information.
      Returns:
      The obtained ImageView.

    • coins

      private static javafx.scene.layout.HBox coins(int coins, BoardContainer boardContainer)
      General box for containing the number of coins of a player.
      Parameters:
      coins - The number of coins to display.
      boardContainer - The BoardContainer for storing all required information.
      Returns:
      The generated HBox.
